#summary Learn how you can extend the GWT Debug Panel to show data specific to your application.

_Under Construction_

You can
   * extend the main panel's view (see [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/widgets/GwtDebugStatisticsView.java GwtDebugStatisticsView] to see how to extend the [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/widgets/DebugStatisticsView.java DebugStatisticsView])
   * extend the main panel's model (see [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/models/GwtDebugStatisticsModel.java GwtDebugStatisticsModel.EventHandler] and implementation thereof: [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/client/DefaultStatisticsModelRpcEventHandler.java DefaultStatisticsModelRpcEventHandler] and [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/client/DefaultStatisticsModelStartupEventHandler.java DefaultStatisticsModelStartupEventHandler])
   * extend the main widget (see [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/widgets/DebugPanelWidget.java DebugPanelWidget.Component])
   * raise your own events in the main application with the [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/common/StatisticsEventDispatcher.java StatisticsEventDispatcher] and create your own view to display the data of those events (see the example's [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/example/java/com/example/app/client/ExceptionHandler.java ExceptionHandler] and the [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/models/ExceptionModel.java ExceptionModel] and its view [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-debug-panel/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/google/gwt/debugpanel/widgets/ExceptionView.java ExceptionView])
   * ...
